Line 25: Line 25:
The [[Chennai Super Kings]] emerged the winners of the tournament, defeating the [[Warriors (cricket team)|Warriors]] in the final. [[Murali Vijay]] from the Chennai Super Kings won the Golden Bat Award and was declared the Man of the Match of the final, while [[Ravichandran Ashwin]] was awarded the Golden Wicket Award and declared the Player of the Tournament.
The [[Chennai Super Kings]] emerged the winners of the tournament, defeating the [[Warriors (cricket team)|Warriors]] in the final. [[Murali Vijay]] from the Chennai Super Kings won the Golden Bat Award and was declared the Man of the Match of the final, while [[Ravichandran Ashwin]] was awarded the Golden Wicket Award and declared the Player of the Tournament.
